meaningMnemonic: A <radical>good</radical> <radical>moon</radical> is a <kanji>bright</kanji> moon. Not just in terms of light, but in mood as well. Like, gee wiz, what a bright, happy moon.
readingMnemonic: It's so <kanji>bright</kanji> that you can see all the <reading>roe</reading> (ろう) in the sea glowing and reflecting the light like stars. And the tiny baby fishies inside the roe are smiling brightly back up at the moon!
